title: Next Century Partners
bio: Next Century Partners, LLC was formed by Michael Rosenfeld, founder and CEO of Woodridge Capital Partners, LLC and a recognized leader in the real estate industry for over 30 years.   Woodridge is a Los Angeles-based real estate company that owns and develops a broad range of hotel, resort, residential, and commercial properties.  Some of the firm’s notable properties have included The Fairmont San Francisco Hotel, the InterContinental Mark Hopkins in San Francisco, Hotel Californian in Santa Barbara, and the Ritz-Carlton Kapalua.

title: Fairmont Hotels & Resorts
bio: Fairmont Hotels & Resorts, part of AccorHotels, connects guests to the very best of its destinations worldwide, providing travelers with memorable travel experiences, thoughtful and attentive service and luxury hotels that are truly unforgettable. Each Fairmont property reflects the locale’s energy, culture and history through locally inspired cuisine, spirited bars and lounges and distinctive design and decor. With more than 70 hotels globally, and more in development, the collection boasts some of the most iconic hotels in the world.

title: Pei Cobb Freed & Partners
bio: With projects in progress in North America, Europe, the Middle East, Asia, and Australia, Pei Cobb Freed & Partners is a leader in architectural design and sustainability. Across six decades of exceptionally diverse practice, the firm has completed building and planning projects in more than 100 cities around the world and has been recognized with more than 200 major design awards, including 24 AIA National Honor Awards.

title: Yabu Pushelberg
bio:
Founded in 1980 by George Yabu and Glenn Pushelberg, Yabu Pushelberg is now one of the most recognized design firms worldwide.

The firm’s multidisciplinary approach is informed by an endless curiosity and driven by partnerships with thoughtful, creative like-minded people. Evolving to encompass all aspects of design, each new venture reflects an edited approach that shifts between the rational and the intuitive.

With studios in Toronto and New York and current projects in over sixteen countries, attention to detail and a spirit of exploration remain a hallmark of the firm.

title: Marmol Radziner
bio: Marmol Radziner, formed in 1989 by Leo Marmol, FAIA, and Ron Radziner, FAIA, is an established leader in the modern architectural restoration of both private and public buildings. Their recent work, including Richard Neutra’s Kronish House and E. Stewart Williams’ Santa Fe Federal Savings and Loan—now the Palm Springs Art Museum’s Architecture and Design Center—have garnered awards from the California Preservation Foundation, the State Office of Historic Preservation and California State Parks, and Docomomo US.

title: Gensler
bio: Gensler is a global architecture, design and planning firm with 44 locations and more than 5,000 professionals networked across Asia, Europe, Australia, the Middle East and the Americas. Founded in 1965, the firm serves more than 3,500 active clients in virtually every industry. Gensler designers strive to make the places people live, work and play more inspiring, more resilient and more impactful.

title: Harley Ellis Devereaux
bio: Harley Ellis Devereaux (HED) was founded in 1908 and is one of the few architectural firms to reach this 100-year milestone.  Their longevity has fostered experience and stability, and the over 400-person firm has developed a unique expertise in creating and documenting the myriad of details required for the comprehensive building permitting and construction drawing process. HED has also served as Executive Architects for Rick Caruso’s 15-acre mixed-use development America on Brand in Glendale, Greenland USA’s 40 and 56-story Metropolis condominium towers in downtown Los Angeles, and Woodridge Capital’s 24-story Carlyle luxury residences in Westwood.  HED has six U.S. offices in Chicago, Detroit, Los Angeles, San Diego, San Francisco and Sacramento.

title: Rios Clementi Hale Studios
bio: Design is never without story. It connects people to each other and the world around us. Rios Clementi Hale Studios works beyond boundaries to reveal, explore, and invent designs that amplify experiences. We create singular, integrated and comprehensive solutions for a variety of design challenges. Combined, our talents comprise a wide range of professional skills including architecture, landscape architecture, urban planning and design, interior design, graphics and signage, exhibit and product design, and fashion design.

title: Jaume Plensa
bio: Jaume Plensa is one of the world's foremost sculptors, internationally celebrated with museum exhibitions and public works alike. Over thirty projects by Plensa span the globe from London to Tokyo. Based in Barcelona, the artist is renowned for creating engaging and intuitive works that speak to both the power of individual introspection and a common humanity.
